alert.note: Alert for Bellevue and Vicinity; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 1:47AM PDT by NWS Seattle
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central King and northern Pierce Counties through 230 AM PDT... At 146 AM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Covington, or near Auburn, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bellevue, Kent, Auburn, North Bend, Carnation, Renton, Redmond, Sammamish, Issaquah, Maple Valley, Covington, Snoqualmie, Enumclaw, Newcastle, Duvall, Black Diamond, Algona, West Lake Sammamish, Hobart and Maple Heights-Lake Desire. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bellevue and Vicinity; West Slopes North Central Cascades and Passes
